channel.title: RSPS - Making it public
channel.description: Could anyone give me a link to a tutorial of how to make your RSPS public? I don't find the YouTube one's very helpful, but if you know one wich is indeed helpful, then please tell me below or send me a private message.

item.title: RSPS - Making it public
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Its the process of getting your network to open up ports through your router or modem (some can portforward). Then allowing the port to go through your firewall, setting a no-ip for others to play on, changing the serverip in the client to your no-ip.

If you need help… message me

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Making it public
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

Utorrent way.

1- Download utorrent

2- Download No-ip DUC ( make no-ip host)

3- Set your client files to that host ip ( Client.java, Gui.java)

4- Put no-ip DUC on

5- open source

6- Open utorrent

7- go to options>>network>> and change port to 43594

8- close and reopen source.

and ur done

Read full topic
